ðŸ“– Summary: Glide is an extensible and keyboard-focused web browser built on Firefox. It allows users to navigate the web efficiently using only a keyboard, offering features like modal-based keymaps, TypeScript configuration, and web extension API support. It also includes a fuzzy tab manager and site-specific settings/keymaps.
